extendedInfo.description: If you have a health condition like diabetes, information about what you eat can be important. GoMealsÂ® was developed to help you make healthy lifestyle choices at home or on the go. Now GoMeals includes tools for eating healthy, staying active, and tracking your blood glucose levels.FOOD TRACKERGoMeals is more than a calorie counter. With nutritional values for your favorite foods and restaurant menu items powered by the CalorieKingâ¢ food database, Search thousands of foods and dishes from popular restaurants, grocery stores and the items you have in your own kitchen to easily see the nutritional value (i.e., calories, carbohydrates, fats, protein, etc.) of the foods you eat.ACTIVITY TRACKERWith the new activity tracker, GoMeals lets you calculate the number of calories you burn. Select a physical activity and your intensity level. You can even save your favorite activities into a customized workout. GLUCOSE TRACKERIf you have diabetes, you may be checking your blood sugar levels several times a day. GoMeals offers you a handy place to record and view your numbers. Track your highs and lows. And with meal and exercise tags, you'll have a handy log of your readings to share with your physician.RESTAURANT LOCATORDiscover restaurants in your area with GoMeals. The app will even show you which restaurants are closest and map the location. With a database of over 20,000 restaurant items, you can make healthy eating choices before you even step in the door.CLOUD SYNCWhen you log in with a free GoMeals account, you get the added benefit of backing up your history and favorites to our cloud network. And if you use GoMeals on multiple devices or on the Web (with GoMeals Online) your data will be waiting for you! Manage your nutrition and exercise, and give yourself the tools and information you need to manage diabetes. Even if you don't have diabetes, you'll still find GoMeals a great resource for a healthy lifestyle.Join the GoMeals conversation on Twitter. Follow GoMeals at http://twitter.com/gomeals

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: The update is HORRIBLE.   This app was my lifesaver as the mom of a diabetic child.  Now there isn\'tkids menu info on tge restaurants. Please fix...   :(
reviews.author: Meighen Stebbins

reviews.title: Scanner hard to find correct foods
reviews.comment: I used other apps that allows me scan, wish go meals did. But you able track mire areas in go meal if you can find the foods and not spend your meal time searching for food. I will keep using this hoping for scanner ASAP
reviews.author: Mark Kniphfer

reviews.title: Restaurant\'s aren\'t listed
reviews.comment: I\'m a long haul driver and I stop at TA\'s & Petro\'s for a hot meal when I can slow down a little. But \"Country Pride\", \"Fork in the Road\", \"Buck Horn\" and a forth I can\'t remember aren\'t here.
reviews.author: Edwin Knutson

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: I would love to see a more simplified way to enter meals.   A timer/reminder feature for checking glucose readings would be awesome!
reviews.author: Tara Mims

reviews.title: Too many crashes:\'(
reviews.comment: Crashes on HTC inspire/ONE...has deleted all my entries for the past month...lost lots of info, saved favorites & custom foods are all gone... Ugh!! Great app for diabetes & losing weight.. just not dependable with the crashes and losing stored info... Please fix!!
reviews.author: Jackie Wilmot

reviews.title: Easy to use.
reviews.comment: The only problem I have had is the updating from the cell phone ap to the online ap.
reviews.author: Royce Morgan

reviews.title: Needs barcode scanner!
reviews.comment: Downloaded on the advice of my diabetes educator.  It\'s OK so far.  Interface is pretty, but counterintuitive at times.   Some of the foods I eat are not in the database. App is huge.  But my biggest gripe is NO BARCODE SCANNER!  Every other meal tracking program I\'ve used (my fitness pal, fat secret) has this capability.  I\'d expect better from a firm that has as much resources available as Sanofi-Aventis.  And I can\'t help but wonder what a drug manufacturer is doing with my data ... uninstalling.
reviews.author: Patti Feit

reviews.title: Best calorie calculator and percentage distributor
reviews.comment: Would be perfect if only the percentages of carbs protein and fat had adjustable goal tables as well. Al  so it would be helpful if the excersise calories burned were deducted frm the entire days caloric intake on the final days calculations.
reviews.author: Tiffany Bormann

reviews.title: Keeps you honest & on track
reviews.comment: Takes a little time to learn but after that it is a very good way to keep record and spot issues before they happen. Wish it had a bar code scanner. Also a better way to contact them than Twitter , like an email address.
reviews.author: Ross Richardson

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: A great application, this is a must have app. Needs a to include a log for blood pressure along with blood sugar.
reviews.author: Dwayne Hicks

reviews.title: Hate it !
reviews.comment: Can\'t find simple foods such as a slice of wheat bread.  All foods are to complex.  Need to make this app more simple and user friendly.  With a larger variety of everyday foods.
reviews.author: Loyal Taurus

reviews.title: It\'s great!
reviews.comment: I have to carb count instead of my calories. And I\'m elated that this app includes the total carbohydrates! Makes my life much easier..
reviews.author: Kim Carden

reviews.title: Good app. Wish it had more restaurants
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t have all of rhe most popular restaurants or food manufacturing info. Very easy to update if you have needed information.
reviews.author: Jonathan Walsh

reviews.title: Good app to have
reviews.comment: There are a few food items that aren\'t found in the data base, but I like it.
reviews.author: Nicole Littleton

reviews.title: Worth Downloading
reviews.comment: Verrrry Helpful
reviews.author: deb maltman

reviews.title: Should support Wi-Fi only devices
reviews.comment: Should support Wi-Fi only devices.There are lots of hotspots available nowadays not to mention portable ones which is what I use with my tablet . There should also be a way to enter exact time on blood sugar log and an idit option to correct entries. Currently App is as useful as a placebo.
reviews.author: Timm Obi

reviews.title: wish I could scan bar codes
reviews.comment: I use other apps that allows scanning of bar code and finding foods.   also it doesn\'t remember from day to day what I eat.  Other Apps do that without having to make the food a favorite.   Takes longer to log foods than other Apps.  Unless major changes are made I will delete the app soon.
reviews.author: Margaret Hickman

reviews.title: nice app
reviews.comment: Would be a five star app if it had a bar code scanner and and cleaner interface for finding good items.
reviews.author: Ray Bretthauer

reviews.title: Excellent App!
reviews.comment: Really helps keep me on track with my wellness plan.
reviews.author: Catricia Sloan

reviews.title: Really good app!
reviews.comment: The only thing I would add would be a section for notes so that I could report illnesses and other factors.
reviews.author: Katie L Marker
